entry.title: Deluxe Patio Base for Heavy and Offset Umbrellas
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 239.00

Description

  • 4 heavy duty, dark grey plastic weights make up this base designed for heavy offset and articulating umbrellas
  • Design is compatible with specific offset cross-base umbrella series, or any cross-base umbrella design
  • Lift handles under each weight make lifting and transporting easy
  • Base is designed with clearance to accommodate umbrellas with foot pedals
  • Minimal assembly required - just fill and place on the base of your umbrella
  • Each piece holds 18L and weighs 47lbs/21kg with water, or 61lbs/27.5kg with sand when filled completely

Support your deluxe patio umbrella with this heavy-duty umbrella base made up of four durable, individual weights. Designed to withstand strong winds, this base supports heavy offset and articulating umbrellas with cross-bases and/or pedals. Simply fill these strong weights with the easy-fill spouts place them on the base of your umbrella to keep in place. With minimal assembly required, you'll be worry-free and enjoying your outdoor space in a matter of minutes!

Specifications

Assembly Required Yes
Product Dimensions 5"H X 42"W X 42"D
Product Weight 21 lbs.
Carton Shipping Dimensions 19"H X 21"W X 21"D
Carton Shipping Weight 24 lbs.
Materials Metal, Plastic
Max Weight 0 lbs.

entry.title: Umbrella Base with Wheels
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 179.00

Description

  • Heavy-duty dark grey plastic base comes with a built-in metal base to secure umbrella post
  • Specifically designed to pair with the CorLiving UV resistant offset patio umbrella series (996812)
  • Built-in metal base adds strength and is easily removable for simple installation
  • 2 wheels on the bottom of the base tilt to the ground and assist in moving your umbrella without having to drain or disassemble
  • Side drain hole to make draining easy
  • Lift handle on the bottom of base to make lifting and transporting easy
  • Holds 45L and weighs 122lbs/55kg with water, or 158lbs/72kg with sand when filled completely

Support your patio umbrella with this heavy-duty umbrella base. Constructed to withstand strong winds, this base is uniquely designed with two wheels to make moving your umbrella a breeze! Simply tilt and roll. This base features a strong, built-in metal base. With an easy-fill spout and additional side drain hole make assembly, transportation, and storage quick and easy, this base allows you more time to relax and enjoy your outdoor space.
